_rawChildren.text: Choosing a gift for a Software Developer may not be a mission impossible ... Especially with our help! In this list, we give you suggestions for Best Gifts for Software Developers so that you always have the most suitable gift!

children.text: Choosing a gift for a Software Developer may not be a mission impossible ... Especially with our help! In this list, we give you suggestions for Best Gifts for Software Developers so that you always have the most suitable gift!

When he sees the inscription on the T-shirt ... every Software developer knows what it's about. These stages don’t just exist, but we relive them often. On the other side- your gift will be appreciated. precisely because of the humor of this super cool T-shirt.

Innovative and very impressive gift! With the Raspberry Pi, your programmer will have a lot of fun! This small and smart computer will impress you with its super cool features! With it, you can develop your imagination and achieve mega cool things. For example, when you open the door to light the bulbs in the welcome room. How cool is that?

This laptop case will not only delight every programmer but will also use it every day. Both fun and a practical gift! And with this case, he will be able to show it to everyone else. ... So that they know that "IT WORKS!"

Our offer for Razer Keyboard may be among the most basic gifts, but the keyboard is super good. Thanks to its mechanical switches, silent keys, and compact shape. And a bonus - of course, the elegantly lit buttons! Universal, practical, and a quite beautiful gift, if you ask us personally. Just wrap stylishly and you have a unique gift idea!

The cup is a universal gift, but this cup is SMART! An innovative gift, specially created for all fans of smart technologies. The unique display of the smart mug shows in real-time the current temperature of the liquid. Also its volume, and your daily fluid consumption. What's more ... you can create your own intake plan and it will record accurate data to help you develop a good drinking habit.

Traditional gift with a light twist. The sweatshirt says: "WORLD'S OKAYEST WEB DEVELOPER" and believe us … that will make every programmer smile. And get proud. And besides, the sweatshirt is super cozy and comfortable!

One of our favorite gifts on this list is the Echo Dot. It can intelligently control Smart Home devices compatible with Amazon’s Alexa, play music, set commands to read the news, check the time, and many more features related to the innovative solutions for building and managing the home of a Software Developer!

With Philips Smart Bulb we may surprise you. But, if you think about it - do you think there is a software developer who is not happy with a "smart" device? Besides, Philips Hue is an intelligent solution for lighting the home, office, or room of your Software person! Control it with the push of a button on your mobile device or your favorite voice assistant.
